title: Source: Nuggets' Westbrook to decline option
description: Nuggets guard Russell Westbrook is declining his $3.4 million player option for next season and will become a free agent later this month, a source told ESPN's Shams Charania.

title: Aces star Wilson placed in concussion protocol
description: The Las Vegas Aces placed three-time WNBA MVP A'ja Wilson in the concussion protocol Friday and will miss the team's game against the Dallas Wings.
author: Kendra Andrews

title: Littler, Humphries, Wade & Beckham in King's Honours
description: Darts duo Luke Littler and Luke Humphries are awarded MBEs in the King's Birthday Honours, while Virginia Wade earns a CBE.

title: Burns leads as Scheffler and McIlroy make US Open cut
description: Sam Burns hits a sensational five-under 65 to lead the US Open as Scottie Scheffler and Rory McIlroy make the cut.

title: Frank appointed Tottenham head coach
description: Tottenham have appointed Thomas Frank as their new head coach.

title: McIlroy, Scheffler stutter through as DeChambeau makes shock major exit
description: Rory McIlroy recovered from a nightmare start to his second round to sneak through to the weekend at the US Open as defending champion Bryson DeChambeau suffered a shock early exit.

title: How Lou Anarumo can help Indianapolis Colts' defense improve in this key area
description: Here is how new DC Lou Anarumo can help the Indianapolis Colts' defense improve in this key area.

title: Seattle Storm React to Historic Skylar Diggins News
